Change all Maxent files from ascii to tif
==============================================



```{r convert_data}
library(raster)

maxent.dir <- c("~/GIS_data/Hunter/Maxent_files/output_27.05.13/")
zonation.dir <- c("~/GIS_data/Hunter/zonation/greater hunter/")

asc.files <- dir(maxent.dir, pattern=".asc$")

convert.to.tif <- function (asc.file) {
  r <- raster(paste0(maxent.dir,asc.file))
  species <- names(r)
  r <- round(r*1000,0)
  
  writeRaster(r,paste0(zonation.dir,species,".tif"), overwrite=T)
  cat("converted",species, "to tif","\n")
}

lapply(asc.files,convert.to.tif)


```
